title: TFT is pissing me off.
body: After basically 2 days in queue i finally got in and queued up for TFT was watching boxbox in the background and saw that his queue was bugged out and take way longer than it should have. He logs out and logs back in immediately. noticing that my queue was also bugged I do the same thing thinking that it would help. But now I am in queue again but this time it's telling me it will take 18hrs. Riot what the fuck is this bulshit why does this shit keep happening to me???

replies.body:
Happens to everyone. Same here bro.
Still a Beta and they have to fix it with a 30 man team so............
Relax and be thankful that they made a great game an hope that it wont bug on release ^^
streamers have a bypass on the queue.  If you are not a famous streamer, idk why you would log out
what does this have to do with tft?
A ludicrous number of people are trying to play TFT, apparently. The PBE is simply not big enough to handle it all, so this is happening to everyone.
